actions.Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Lo:
A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater.
The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash
action as a bonus action.
Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage, and the target is
grappled (escape DC 10). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.
The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.
The octopus can breathe only underwater.
